ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] pictures
ygData.msgSnippet: pretty please, ur being the owner can u add a main picture for the group? Su  wrote:Because of spammers. Before I turned posting
ygData.messageBody:
pretty please, ur being the owner can u add a main picture for the group?

Su <suceress@...> wrote:
Because of spammers. Before I turned posting pictures off there were some spammers uploading things that had nothing to do with EverQuest so I had to turn it off to prevent it. They were doing that for file uploading as well so I had to disable that.
Otherwise we'd be getting graphics of ads for lousy porn and probably those annoying ones about Islam. Possibly those scams from Nigeria as well.
luv,
-Su ~list owner~
